name: 8 Remaining Set
8 Remaining Minus

command: for i in /var/lib/motion/old/*; do sudo rm -f "$i"; done
name: Remove old

command: for i in /var/lib/motion/*.*; do sudo mv "$i" /var/lib/motion/old/; done
name: move currant
Backup - remove old Motion Files
info:
This deletes all images and video in
/var/lib/motion/old/ and then moves all
currant files from /var/lib/motion/
to the old directory.
Now set to run each Monday.

name: Get 8
func:
msg.payload = flow.get("s8", "storeInFile");

return msg;

name: Store 8
8 Remaining Stop
func:
global.set("sp8Remaining", 0);


return msg;
